Vendor: Chuck
Type: Other Part

Type: Battery Adhesive

entry.title: Home Button With Flex Return Function Solution Universal For iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Home Button
Price: 12.99

This new 2019 universal Home Button & Flex is designed to replace your defective, cracked Home Button for your iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus. This repair will allow the return-to-home feature with haptic feedback if you damaged your original home button and need to replace it. Please note that touch id will still not work because it can only work with the original home button. This new model does not require bluetooth or a special charging port to be attached.

Lifetime Warranty

The Replacement iPhone Home Button & Flex comes with lifetime warranty, as the other Small Parts Parts.

Part Type iPhone Charging Port & Home Button Assembly
Compatible Model iPhone 7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus 
Model Number A1661 / A1784 / A1785 A1661 / A1784 / A1785 / A1863 / A1905 / A1864
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty Lifetime Warranty

entry.title: iPhone 8 Plus Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 21.99

You have an iPhone 8 Plus that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your iPhone 8 Plus shuts down unexpectedly ?

Your cell phone only works when the battery is plugged in ?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new iPhone 8 Plus replacement battery.

The battery in your iPhone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

 

Our batteries are produced with the same quality standard as original Apple iPhone batteries. The iPhone 8 Plus replacement battery power is rated at 2691 mAh (10.28 Wh).

After this easy battery repair, it will have the same battery health as when your iPhone 8 Plus was new.

The battery life will last long enough for up 21 hours of talk time.

 

  • Zero cycle count
  • UN38.3, MSDS, ROHS, CE Certification
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • Less than 20 minutes to replace
  • Adhesive strips are included
  • 1-Year Warranty

 

Compatibility

This lithium ion battery battery is only compatible with an iPhone 8 Plus.

 

Warranty

The Replacement iPhone 8 Plus Battery comes with 1-year warranty, as with all the other iPhone battery Replacement Parts. For any assistance with installation or questions with your product please don’t hesitate to contact our support team. Don’t forget to power off your iPhone before attempting the repair.

 

Part Type iPhone Battery
Compatible Model iPhone 8 Plus (5.5")
Model Number A1864 / A1897 / A1898 / A1899
Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.title: Tempered Glass Screen Protector For iPhone 10 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Tempered Glass
Price: 9.99 - 17.99 (8 variants)

Pack of 10 Tempered Glasses

 

Add an extra layer of protection on your screen of to protect it from scratches and cracking. It is 0.2mm thick at 9H Durability with a 2.5D curve to fit perfectly.

They have an oleophobic coating to make them oil-resistant and prevent fingerprints to ensure perfect image clarity and touch sensitivity.

The 0.2mm thickness and flexibility makes them very easy to apply.

 

Part Type iPhone Tempered Glass
Compatible With iPhone
